us.name: PG
us.description: Parental guidance suggested. Some material may not be suitable for children.

us.name: PG-13
us.description: Parents strongly cautioned. Some material may be inappropriate for children under 13.

us.name: R
us.description: Restricted. Under 17 requires accompanying parent or adult guardian.

us.name: NC-17
us.description: Adults only. No one 17 and under admitted.
